pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Purifying Enzyme Mask 120g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Purifying Enzyme Mask is a cooling clay mask that uses Natural Kaolin Clay, to lift out impurities in minutes, to deeply purify and cleanse skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Also containing skin smoothing Papaya Enzyme to gently exfoliate, resulting in velvety, soft skin. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Kaolin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Isopropyl Myristate, Bentonite, Glycereth-26, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Tocopheryl, Ceteareth-20, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Glyceral Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Magnesium Oxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Propylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Silica, Quartz , Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol.

Directions

Apply a thin layer of product to dry, clean skin, avoiding the eye area. Allow to dry for up to 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with water, or remove with a damp cloth. Use 1-3 times a week.
